## MapRenderingManager.(constructor)

The constructor of `MapRenderingManager`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(width: number, height: number, lowResPixelRatio: number | undefined, antialiasSettings?: IMapAntialiasSettings | undefined);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | number | Width of the frame buffer. |
|  height | number | Height of the frame buffer. |
|  lowResPixelRatio | number \| undefined | The <code>pixelRatio</code> determines the resolution of the internal <code>WebGLRenderTarget</code>. Values between 0.5 and <code>window.devicePixelRatio</code> can be tried to give good results. A value of <code>undefined</code> disables the low res render pass. The value should not be larger than<code>window.devicePixelRatio</code>. |
|  antialiasSettings | [IMapAntialiasSettings](./harp-mapview.imapantialiassettings.md) \| undefined |  |
